'''Youko''' is an event-exclusive [[NPC]] who first appeared in ''[[Akitsu Kimodameshi]]''. She is a [[Kitsune (Species)|kitsune]] who is close friends with [[Hitotsume Kozou]] and [[Kappa]].

===Appearance===
Youko takes the form of a young girl with pale skin and a black bob haircut. She appears to wear a black fox mask with gold and indigo markings, along with sandals and a purple flower-print yukata tied with a red obi.
